body_html:
@wchan I was able to do multi-GPU training with tensorflow 0.5, but not with tensorflow 0.6. Did you find this problem? When you use multiple GPUs, do all GPUs work normally? When you do ctrl+c, does it crash the driver every time?

I was using the official example cifar10_multi_gpu_train.py to test multi-GPU training

body:
@wchan I was able to do multi-GPU training with tensorflow 0.5, but not with tensorflow 0.6. Did you find this problem? When you use multiple GPUs, do all GPUs work normally? When you do ctrl+c, does it crash the driver every time?

I was using the official example cifar10_multi_gpu_train.py to test multi-GPU training
